title: Save Up When You Buy the Samsung Galaxy A16!
description: It's not the most powerful phone from Samsung, but it's extremely affordable. The post Save Up When You Buy the Samsung Galaxy A16! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's not the most powerful phone from Samsung, but it's extremely affordable.
text: After a new smartphone without breaking the bank? Then you might want to check out the Samsung Galaxy A16, a budget-friendly smartphone that  offers pretty decent features for everyday use. It’s currently available for under $200, thanks to this deal from Amazon. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!) The Galaxy A16 features a 6.7-inch AMOLED screen, an Exynos 1330 chipset, 4GB of RAM, and a triple-camera system with a 50MP main sensor. In addition to all this, one standout feature of the A16 is its software support—Samsung promises up to six years of major Android upgrades, making it an ideal choice if you plan on keeping your phone for an extended period of time. You can grab it via the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
After a new smartphone without breaking the bank? Then you might want to check out the Samsung Galaxy A16, a budget-friendly smartphone that  offers pretty decent features for everyday use. It’s currently available for under $200, thanks to this deal from Amazon.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!)

The Galaxy A16 features a 6.7-inch AMOLED screen, an Exynos 1330 chipset, 4GB of RAM, and a triple-camera system with a 50MP main sensor. In addition to all this, one standout feature of the A16 is its software support—Samsung promises up to six years of major Android upgrades, making it an ideal choice if you plan on keeping your phone for an extended period of time. You can grab it via the link below.
